item.title: By: The Lesson of Mug’thol at MMOG Nation
item.dc:creator: The Lesson of Mug’thol at MMOG Nation
item.description: [...] Just the same, a 368 person line with a wait time of about 40 minutes is quite a while to wait for my fix. They’re trying to work on it by offering server transfers but, as AFK Gamer points out, they’re not doing the best job arranging the actual movement of players. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Just the same, a 368 person line with a wait time of about 40 minutes is quite a while to wait for my fix. They’re trying to work on it by offering server transfers but, as AFK Gamer points out, they’re not doing the best job arranging the actual movement of players. […]

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description: I'm suprised they didn't also offer a transfer from Mug'thol to Garithos, since that 3 realm transfer (which Warsong was included in) resulted in a ghost town from what I've heard.
item.content:encoded: I’m suprised they didn’t also offer a transfer from Mug’thol to Garithos, since that 3 realm transfer (which Warsong was included in) resulted in a ghost town from what I’ve heard.

item.title: By: Finster
item.dc:creator: Finster
item.description: Hmm, I wondering if the domino effect of realm transfers will cascade its way to my server. I would laugh. And then I would cry.
item.content:encoded: Hmm, I wondering if the domino effect of realm transfers will cascade its way to my server. I would laugh. And then I would cry.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Archimonde is underpopulated from <a href="http://forums.worldofwarcraft.com/thread.aspx?fn=wow-general&t=6816299&tmp=1#post6816299" rel="nofollow">the recent evacuation <strong>to</strong> Mug'thol</a>:
<blockquote>We will be opening character transfers for the 8 realms listed below today at 3:00 AM. Characters on these realms will be able to transfer to the new PvP realm, Mug'thol. This round of transfers will be open Monday through Friday from 3:00 AM to 3:00 PM PST until Wednesday, February 1 at 3:00 PM PST. Please be aware that until the transfer window is closed, standard character creation will be unavailable on this realm.
Archimonde Mannoroth Warsong Bleeding Hollow Skullcrusher Azgalor Burning Blade Burning Legion</blockquote>
Originally, some PVE and RP realms were going to be allowed onto Mug'thol also and they realized that probably wasn't appropriate and limited Mug'thol to PVP evacuees only.
It's really hard to keep up. People come and go so quickly around here.
item.content:encoded:
Archimonde is underpopulated from the recent evacuation to Mug’thol:

We will be opening character transfers for the 8 realms listed below today at 3:00 AM. Characters on these realms will be able to transfer to the new PvP realm, Mug’thol. This round of transfers will be open Monday through Friday from 3:00 AM to 3:00 PM PST until Wednesday, February 1 at 3:00 PM PST. Please be aware that until the transfer window is closed, standard character creation will be unavailable on this realm.

Archimonde
Mannoroth
Warsong
Bleeding Hollow
Skullcrusher
Azgalor
Burning Blade
Burning Legion

Originally, some PVE and RP realms were going to be allowed onto Mug’thol also and they realized that probably wasn’t appropriate and limited Mug’thol to PVP evacuees only.

It’s really hard to keep up. People come and go so quickly around here.

item.title: By: Shin
item.dc:creator: Shin
item.description:
Since they opened transfer from Archimond to Dethecus, which is now an over populated server :)
God, US Transfers are even worse than EU ones. Old server to Old server, wtf?
